The judge questioned the lack of corroborating witnesses or evidence from other building residents regarding the alleged incidents.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/difficult-to-believe-that-71-year-old-man-with-two-eye-surgeries-could-wink-at-9-year-old-neighbour-says-mumbai-court-acquits-him-in-pocso-case-due-to-lack-of-evidence/articleshow/123169979.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/difficult-to-believe-that-71-year-old-man-with-two-eye-surgeries-could-wink-at-9-year-old-neighbour-says-mumbai-court-acquits-him-in-pocso-case-due-to-lack-of-evidence/articleshow/123169979.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 08:36:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>REBECCA SAMERVEL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="134178" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123178750,imgsize-134178.cms"/></item><item><title>Elon Musk says 'OpenAI will eat Microsoft alive' as Nadella champions GPT-5 rollout</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk ignited a fresh AI feud by claiming OpenAI will surpass Microsoft, despite Satya Nadella's announcement of GPT-5's full integration across Microsoft's platforms. Musk asserted xAI's Grok models have already exceeded GPT-5 in intelligence and teased a superior Grok 5. This rivalry highlights the shifting dynamics between OpenAI and Microsoft, raising concerns about Microsoft's dependence on its AI partner.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/elon-musk-says-openai-will-eat-microsoft-alive-as-nadella-champions-gpt-5-rollout/articleshow/123183029.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/elon-musk-says-openai-will-eat-microsoft-alive-as-nadella-champions-gpt-5-rollout/articleshow/123183029.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:57:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39424" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123183144,imgsize-39424.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG | On-field shenanigans kept the series dramatic - here's why</title><description><![CDATA[The Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy between India and England emerged as an era-defining rivalry, marked by record-breaking performances and intense confrontations. Shubman Gill's captaincy and England's 'Bazball' approach set the stage for a heated series filled with on-field clashes and emotional spikes. Despite the drama and verbal exchanges, moments of respect and sportsmanship highlighted the enduring appeal of Test cricket.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/grow-some-b-to-handshake-snubs-how-on-field-shenanigans-kept-the-india-vs-england-series-on-its-toes/articleshow/123183129.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/grow-some-b-to-handshake-snubs-how-on-field-shenanigans-kept-the-india-vs-england-series-on-its-toes/articleshow/123183129.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:31:28 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>HIJAM RAJU SINGH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="83470" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123183614,imgsize-83470.cms"/></item><item><title>Huma Qureshi's cousin murdered: Chilling visuals from crime scene emerge</title><description><![CDATA[Asif Qureshi, relative of Bollywood actor Huma Qureshi, was murdered in Delhi. Two brothers, Gautam and Ujjwal, have been arrested. Ujjwal initiated the attack. Police have registered a murder case. Investigation is currently underway.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/huma-qureshis-cousin-murdered-chilling-visuals-from-crime-scene-emerge-asif-was-stabbed-multiple-times-by-duo/articleshow/123179651.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/huma-qureshis-cousin-murdered-chilling-visuals-from-crime-scene-emerge-asif-was-stabbed-multiple-times-by-duo/articleshow/123179651.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 10:01:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4095319" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182348,imgsize-4095319.cms"/></item><item><title>'Only Tamil and English to continue': Stalin rolls out new education policy for TN</title><description><![CDATA[Tamil Nadu CM M.K. The state government strongly opposes the NEP, viewing it as a Hindi imposition and against social justice.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/amid-language-row-tamil-nadu-cm-mk-stalin-rolls-out-new-education-policy-for-state/articleshow/123180872.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/chennai/amid-language-row-tamil-nadu-cm-mk-stalin-rolls-out-new-education-policy-for-state/articleshow/123180872.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 11:03:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31576" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123180816,imgsize-31576.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump asks for Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan's resignation; CEO replies: 'The US has been … '</title><description><![CDATA[Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan is facing immense pressure following criticism from President Trump and Senator Cotton regarding his Chinese business ties. Tan defended his leadership and commitment to US national security, dismissing concerns about his investments as misinformation. The controversy arises amidst Intel's efforts to secure CHIPS Act funding and disagreements within the company about its future direction.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/intel-ceo-lip-bu-tan-replies-to-donald-trumps-call-to-resign-immediately-let-me-start-by-saying-this-the-united-states-has-been/articleshow/123183850.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/intel-ceo-lip-bu-tan-replies-to-donald-trumps-call-to-resign-immediately-let-me-start-by-saying-this-the-united-states-has-been/articleshow/123183850.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:25:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23460" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123183831,imgsize-23460.cms"/></item><item><title>'Sign declaration or apologise': EC counters Rahul over 'vote chori' claim</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission confronts Rahul Gandhi over electoral fraud claims. They demand he signs a declaration supporting his allegations. Alternatively, the commission wants an apology. Gandhi alleges vote manipulation in Karnataka. He accuses the EC of colluding with the BJP. The EC denies destroying evidence. They state Gandhi failed to respond to earlier requests for proof.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sign-the-declaration-or-apologise-ec-terms-rahul-gandhis-vote-chori-claim-absurd-asks-lop-to-prove-charge/articleshow/123181972.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sign-the-declaration-or-apologise-ec-terms-rahul-gandhis-vote-chori-claim-absurd-asks-lop-to-prove-charge/articleshow/123181972.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:07:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1013260" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123181949,imgsize-1013260.cms"/></item><item><title>Cricket: Kohli’s 2018 masterclass vs England still outshines Gill’s run-fest in 2025</title><description><![CDATA[Shubman Gill's stellar performance in the drawn Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy has sparked comparisons with Virat Kohli's 2018 tour. Gill amassed 754 runs, surpassing Kohli's series total, but Kohli's innings was played in tougher conditions. While Gill's series was exceptional, Kohli's resilience in 2018 remains a testament to his fighting spirit.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/virat-kohlis-2018-masterclass-against-england-still-outshines-shubman-gills-run-fest-in-2025/articleshow/123182315.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/virat-kohlis-2018-masterclass-against-england-still-outshines-shubman-gills-run-fest-in-2025/articleshow/123182315.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:36:20 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRANAV SHUKLA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="38048" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182759,imgsize-38048.cms"/></item><item><title>With Trump’s 50% tariffs looming, India reviews market access offer to US</title><description><![CDATA[Despite increased US tariffs on crude oil trade with Russia, India is reassessing its market access offers to the US, aiming to finalize a trade deal this month. While committed to protecting its agricultural and dairy sectors, India is exploring improvements in other areas.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-us-trade-deal-with-donald-trumps-50-tariffs-looming-india-reviews-market-access-offers-for-us-but-red-lines-on-agriculture-dairy-stay/articleshow/123182678.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-us-trade-deal-with-donald-trumps-50-tariffs-looming-india-reviews-market-access-offers-for-us-but-red-lines-on-agriculture-dairy-stay/articleshow/123182678.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:33:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="65312" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182687,imgsize-65312.cms"/></item><item><title>OpenAI CEO Sam Altman at GPT-5 launch: India is our second-largest market</title><description><![CDATA[OpenAI has launched GPT-5, its most advanced AI model, boasting significant improvements in accuracy, speed, and reasoning. CEO Sam Altman highlighted India as a rapidly growing market, potentially surpassing the US. GPT-5 is available in various sizes and tiers, including a free version, with enhanced versions for Team, Enterprise, Edu, and Pro users, marking a step towards Artificial General Intelligence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-at-gpt-5-launch-india-is-our-second-largest-marketbut-what-users-are-doing-with/articleshow/123178437.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/openai-ceo-sam-altman-at-gpt-5-launch-india-is-our-second-largest-marketbut-what-users-are-doing-with/articleshow/123178437.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 08:15:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20958" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123178434,imgsize-20958.cms"/></item><item><title>The curious case of India’s teacher shortage and rising literacy</title><description><![CDATA[India’s literacy rate is rising, but a severe teacher shortage threatens future gains. States like Bihar, Punjab, Karnataka, and Rajasthan face tens of thousands of vacancies, with many schools staffed by only one or two teachers. Budget cuts, slow recruitment, and unattractive working conditions fuel the crisis, risking ‘functional illiteracy’ despite glowing literacy statistics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/the-curious-case-of-indias-teacher-shortage-and-rising-literacy-a-crisis-waiting-to-explode/articleshow/123184027.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/the-curious-case-of-indias-teacher-shortage-and-rising-literacy-a-crisis-waiting-to-explode/articleshow/123184027.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:39:59 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="30550" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123184029,imgsize-30550.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch the video and decide: OUT or NOT OUT? Here's what cricket's laws say</title><description><![CDATA[A peculiar incident shared by Indian Premier League franchise Punjab Kings has ignited a debate. A batter's cap fell off, hitting the stumps after striking the ball. The fielding team appealed for a dismissal. Cricket laws state that if the cap dislodged the bails after the shot, it's not out. The decision hinges on the timing of the incident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-the-video-and-decide-out-or-not-out-heres-what-crickets-laws-say/articleshow/123184099.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-the-video-and-decide-out-or-not-out-heres-what-crickets-laws-say/articleshow/123184099.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:45:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="11940" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123184144,imgsize-11940.cms"/></item><item><title>Kapil Sharma’s Canada café targeted over Salman invite, reveals Bishnoi gang member - Report</title><description><![CDATA[Kapil Sharma's Canadian restaurant, Kap's Cafe, has been targeted in two shootings within a month. A gangster from the Lawrence Bishnoi gang claimed responsibility, citing Sharma's invitation to Salman Khan for his Netflix show launch as the motive. The gang has issued threats against anyone working with Salman Khan, vowing violence.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/kapil-sharmas-cafe-in-canada-targeted-over-his-invitation-to-salman-khan-reveals-lawrence-bishnoi-gang-member-report/articleshow/123183034.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/news/kapil-sharmas-cafe-in-canada-targeted-over-his-invitation-to-salman-khan-reveals-lawrence-bishnoi-gang-member-report/articleshow/123183034.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:46:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="31586" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123183023,imgsize-31586.cms"/></item><item><title>After 2-2 vs India, McGrath predicts 5-0 Ashes win for Australia</title><description><![CDATA[Glenn McGrath predicted a 5-0 Ashes sweep for Australia, citing England's batting weaknesses exposed during their recent series against India. He anticipated Australia's strong pace attack, led by Cummins, Starc, Hazlewood, and Lyon, will dominate England's top order, particularly Root and Brook. McGrath acknowledged Australia's top-order concerns but believed England's bowling needs improvement to compete effectively in Australian conditions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/after-2-2-vs-india-glenn-mcgrath-predicts-5-0-ashes-whitewash-warns-england-of-aussie-challenge/articleshow/123182643.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/after-2-2-vs-india-glenn-mcgrath-predicts-5-0-ashes-whitewash-warns-england-of-aussie-challenge/articleshow/123182643.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:26:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="80404" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182682,imgsize-80404.cms"/></item><item><title>SC deletes observations on its order rapping HC judge</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court retracted two paragraphs from its August 4th order concerning Justice Prashant Kumar of the Allahabad High Court. This followed concerns raised by Chief Justice of India BR Gavai regarding remarks perceived as demeaning.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/intention-was-not-to-cast-aspersion-sc-on-its-order-rapping-hc-judge-deletes-observations-from-order/articleshow/123181036.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/intention-was-not-to-cast-aspersion-sc-on-its-order-rapping-hc-judge-deletes-observations-from-order/articleshow/123181036.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 11:19:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="2081141" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123181011,imgsize-2081141.cms"/></item><item><title>FASTag Annual Pass: Rs 3,000 cost, 200 toll trips, how to get yours before August 15 </title><description><![CDATA[The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) will launch the FASTag Annual Pass on August 15, 2025, offering private vehicle owners a prepaid plan of 200 toll crossings or one year of validity for Rs 3,000. This initiative aims to streamline toll payments and reduce the need for frequent recharges on national highways and expressways, enhancing the travel experience.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/auto/news/fastag-annual-pass-rs-3000-cost-200-toll-trips-how-to-get-yours-before-15-august-2025-and-everything-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123182482.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/auto/news/fastag-annual-pass-rs-3000-cost-200-toll-trips-how-to-get-yours-before-15-august-2025-and-everything-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123182482.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 12:23:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TIMESOFINDIA.COM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="35360" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123182584,imgsize-35360.cms"/></item><item><title>Duleep Trophy 2025: Full squads, schedule and venue - All you need to know</title><description><![CDATA[The 2025-26 Indian home cricket season commences with the Duleep Trophy from August 28 to September 15. This red-ball tournament reverts to its traditional zonal format, featuring North, South, East, West, Central, and North East Zones. Matches will primarily be held at the BCCI's Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/duleep-trophy-2025-full-squads-match-schedule-date-and-venue-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123183249.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/duleep-trophy-2025-full-squads-match-schedule-date-and-venue-all-you-need-to-know/articleshow/123183249.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 13:00:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="12982" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123183330,imgsize-12982.cms"/></item><item><title>'Democracy too precious': Tharoor backs Rahul's 'vote chori' claim</title><description><![CDATA[Tharoor further said, "Our democracy is too precious to allow its credibility to be destroyed by incompetence, carelessness or worse, deliberate tampering. Trump was asked; here’s how he responded</title><description><![CDATA[President Trump declared that the U.S. will not engage in trade negotiations with India until the existing tariff dispute is resolved. This decision follows the U.S. imposing a 50% tariff on Indian exports, citing concerns over India's trade imbalance and continued purchase of Russian oil.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/not-until-we-get-it-resolved-trump-rules-out-trade-talks-with-india/articleshow/123177542.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/not-until-we-get-it-resolved-trump-rules-out-trade-talks-with-india/articleshow/123177542.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 06:44:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="932355" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123179014,imgsize-932355.cms"/></item><item><title>Bengaluru: Human body parts found in 5 locations across city, head missing</title><description><![CDATA[A gruesome discovery unfolded near Chimpaganahalli in Tumakuru as a stray dog was spotted carrying a severed human arm, leading to the discovery of mutilated body parts scattered across multiple locations. Police are investigating the chilling murder, deploying forensic teams and dog squads to piece together the crime scene.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/body-found-in-five-locations-in-karnataka-head-missing/articleshow/123172010.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/body-found-in-five-locations-in-karnataka-head-missing/articleshow/123172010.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 07:01:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1042381" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123177734,imgsize-1042381.cms"/></item><item><title>Legionnaires’ disease and air conditioning: A risk you probably didn’t know about</title><description><![CDATA[Legionnaires' disease, a severe pneumonia caused by Legionella bacteria, thrives in stagnant water within large air conditioning systems. The disease spreads through contaminated water droplets, leading to symptoms like fever, cough, and shortness of breath. Prevention relies on regular AC maintenance, water system flushing, and biocide treatments, especially in hotels and public buildings. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/legionnaires-disease-and-air-conditioning-a-risk-you-probably-didnt-know-about/articleshow/123178403.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/health-fitness/health-news/legionnaires-disease-and-air-conditioning-a-risk-you-probably-didnt-know-about/articleshow/123178403.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 08:18:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI LIFESTYLE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="915808" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123178439,imgsize-915808.cms"/></item><item><title>Who is Haider Ali? Pakistan cricketer arrested in England on rape charge</title><description><![CDATA[Haider Ali, a young Pakistan cricketer, has been arrested in England amidst the Shaheens' tour, facing allegations of rape. Greater Manchester Police are investigating the incident, which reportedly occurred on July 23, 2025. The PCB has provisionally suspended Ali and pledged full cooperation with the legal proceedings, casting a shadow over his promising career.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-who-is-haider-ali-pakistan-cricketer-arrested-in-england-on-rape-charge/articleshow/123177750.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/cricket-who-is-haider-ali-pakistan-cricketer-arrested-in-england-on-rape-charge/articleshow/123177750.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 07:06:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="13454" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123177797,imgsize-13454.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The group’s crown jewel, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), has been the biggest casualty, losing nearly $70 billion in market value since September last year.
